Description: A text string that appears on screen when the player attempts to open a door which is locked due to an emergency lockdown. Don't alter the RichText tags.

French.Translation: <color=red>AVERTISSEMENT : système de ventilation hors service. Évacuez immédiatement.<color=red>

Spanish.Translation: <color=red>ADVERTENCIA: Sistema de ventilación desconectado. Evacuar inmediatamente<color=red>.

Russian.Translation: <color=red>ВНИМАНИЕ! Система вентиляции ОТКЛЮЧЕНА. Приступите к немедленной эвакуации.<color=red>

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: <color=red>AVISO: Sistema de ventilação DESLIGADO. Evacue imediatamente <color=red>.

Polish.Translation: <color=red>OSTRZEŻENIE: System wentylacyjny WYŁĄCZONY. Wymagana niezwłoczna ewakuacja<color=red>

Japanese.Translation: <color=red>警告：換気システムがオフライン。即座に退避せよ <color=red>

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: <color=red>警告：通風系統離線。立即疏散<color=red>

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: <color=red>警告：通风系统离线，立即撤离<color=red>

name: LevelLayoutData.ProgressionPuzzle.CustomText8_C2
